# Task Instructions: API Controller Generation

## Scope

Apply these rules when generating or editing API controllers.

## Requirements

- Use the existing controller conventions in this repo
- Validate request models and return structured errors
- Use dependency injection for service access
- Return standard HTTP codes (200, 201, 400, 404, 500)
- Include XML documentation comments

## Constraints

- Do NOT add authentication or authorization logic
- Do NOT access the database directly
- Do NOT introduce new third-party dependencies

## References

- Controllers/V1/ for current patterns
- DTOs/ for request/response models
